hello.text: I think I have a problem, sister. Usually I can read minds pretty well, but lately this has proven to be harder and harder.

how.text: Sleepy. Actually, I have felt drained out for ages now.

what.text: Well, I have been playing with Rin quite a lot yesterday.

check.text: {i}You notice her third eye is bloated, and abnormally red.{s}

mindread.text: You feel a burning eye. It stings.

operate.text: {i}You put Satori to sleep with some flower gaz and make an incision in her eye using one of your rose's thorns. After only a few minutes, you manage to extract fur from inside the eye. Looks like is still pretty damaged though{s}

punch.text: Sister, I'm pretty sure this won't help. I really wonder what you're thinking some times.

prosthesis.text: {i}Looking into your trinkets, you find an adaptative Kappa lense. The lucky find should help with Satori's sight
